meanings.definition: A substance or device used to make something smell fresh or clean.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new air freshener for my car.
meanings.sent2: The air freshener in the bathroom made it smell like flowers.
meanings.sent3: The air freshener in the office was so strong, it made everyone sneeze!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a breath of freshener in the stale room.
meanings.sent5: The freshener sprayed in the room instantly lifted everyone's spirits.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that freshens.
meanings.sent1: The laundry freshener added a pleasant scent to the clothes.
meanings.sent2: The freshener in the team brought new ideas to the project.
meanings.sent3: The freshener in the group always had a joke ready to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like a freshener, bringing positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The freshener in the meeting helped everyone see things from a different perspective.
